bibl.title: The Ptolemaic Army in Upper Egypt (2nd-1st centuries B.C.)
L'armée en Égypte aux époques perse, ptolémaïque et romaine = Cahiers de l'atelier Aigyptos. 2

bibl.note: From crisis to increasing state intervention in Upper Egypt. - Administrative reforms in Upper Egypt. - Military reforms in Upper Egypt. - Regular troops, mercenaries and natives in the army. - Soldiers in the Fayyum (2nd-1st century B.C.). - Soldiers in Upper Egypt (2nd-1st century B.C.). - Conclusions.
bibl.seg: Katelijn Vandorpe, The Ptolemaic Army in Upper Egypt (2nd-1st centuries B.C.).

Anne-Emmanuelle Veïsse & Stéphanie Wackenier (edd.), L'armée en Égypte aux époques perse, ptolémaïque et romaine = Cahiers de l'atelier Aigyptos. 2 = École pratique des hautes Études. Sciences historiques et philologiques. III. Hautes Études du monde gréco-romain. 51 (Genève, 2014) pp. 105-135, 11 figg.

From crisis to increasing state intervention in Upper Egypt. - Administrative reforms in Upper Egypt. - Military reforms in Upper Egypt. - Regular troops, mercenaries and natives in the army. - Soldiers in the Fayyum (2nd-1st century B.C.). - Soldiers in Upper Egypt (2nd-1st century B.C.). - Conclusions.
